item.title: Ana Nora Evans
item.description:
Ana Nora (Sovarel) Evans University of Virginia AnaNEvans@virginia.edu
Research &nbsp · &nbsp Teaching &nbsp · &nbsp Other Activities &nbsp · &nbsp Personal
I am currently enrolled in the Post Graduate Master of Teaching program at the School of Education and Human Development at the University of Virginia, to earn a teaching licence for secondary education in Mathematics and Computer Science. I am on leave of absence from the PhD program in the Computer Science Department at the University of Virgina. My research focuses on testing oracles for autonomous vehicles.
